articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Flour-Processing Combine and Foodstuff Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Flour-Processing Combine and Foodstuff Factory
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il gave field guidance to the Pyongyang Flour-Processing Combine and the Ryongsong Foodstuff Factory.
					 The first leg of his guidance was the Pyongyang Flour-Processing Combine.
					
					 He went round the room devoted to the history of the combine, conducted by leading officials of the combine.
					
					 Looking back with deep emotion on the glorious course covered by the combine, he said that the combine has turned into a large-scale food processing base thanks to the wise leadership and meticulous care of President Kim Il Sung. His immortal revolutionary exploits will shine forever in the history of the country, Kim Jong Il added.
					
					 After being briefed on the combine before a big map showing its panoramic view, he made the rounds of its production processes including the Biscuit Shop to acquaint himself in detail with technical equipment and production there.
					
					 Noting that the combine is an important foodstuff base directly related to improving diet of citizens, he set forth important tasks which would serve as guidelines for managing and operating the combine.
					
					 The most important task facing the combine is to dynamically push ahead with the overall technological updating to realize the modernization and scientization of its production processes in the shortest possible period, he noted.
					
					 Many factories and enterprises across the country including those in Jagang and North Phyongan provinces have successfully introduced CNC technology and pushed back the frontiers of science, thereby bringing about a leap forward in the production, he said, underscoring the need to modernize the combine as required by the IT age.
					
					 He stressed that in order to turn the combine into a modern foodstuff factory based on the latest science and technology it is necessary for the officials and technicians of the combine to boldly design a work and push ahead with it with an innovative eye and, at the same time, universities including Kim Chaek University of Technology, scientific research institutes and construction enterprises should help the combine in its work in a responsible manner from the stand befitting masters.
					
					 Noting that if the combine is technologically updated, its production capacity would remarkably go up, he set forth militant tasks to process more than 100,000 tons of flour and produce more than 50,000 tons of foodstuff such as bread, biscuit, noodle and yeast every year. And he showed such profound loving care as personally solving problems facing the combine.
					
					 The next leg of his guidance was the Ryongsong Foodstuff Factory.
					
					 After being briefed on the factory before a big map showing its panoramic view, he went round the exterior and interior of the factory kept clean and tidy for hours to learn in detail about its technological updating and production there.
					
					 Watching modern foodstuff producing equipment standing in rows at each shop and varieties of tempting foodstuffs including yogurt, soy, soybean paste and table oil being churned out from there in an endless stream, he expressed great satisfaction over the fact that the workers of the factory have achieved leaping progress in the production of foodstuffs by modernizing and scientizing the production processes on the highest level including the process for putting them on a CNC and sterile basis. He highly appreciated the feats performed by them.
					
					 The officials, workers and technicians of the factory have turned it into a standard one in the field of foodstuff industry in the IT age by dynamically waging a mass technical innovation movement true to the WPK's idea of attaching importance to science, he noted, adding that this signal change clearly testifies to validity and vitality of its policy of pushing ahead with the introduction of science and technology as a vital task for building an economic power.
					
					 Saying that the above-said factory has an important role to play in developing the nation's foodstuff industrial technology and improving the people's standard of living, he set forth important tasks to be fulfilled by it.
					
					 An important duty facing the factory is to increase the production of foodstuffs for the improvement of people's diet by giving fullest play to the existing production capacity and ensure their best quality, he noted.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Yong Rim, chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, and Kim Kyong Hui, department director of the Party Central Committee, and its other leading officials.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Inspects Court and Central Court Building
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Inspects Court and Central Court Building
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the newly-built court and the building of the Central Court.
					 He first looked around the newly-built room devoted to the history of the Central Court.
					
					Recollecting the founding of the court, a democratic judicial institution, and the course of its development with deep emotion, he said that the court has developed into a weapon of class struggle and one of proletarian dictatorship under the wise leadership and meticulous care of President
						 Kim Il Sung.
					
					 He highly appreciated the feats of the judicial organ in the past, saying that the court has firmly defended the policies of the WPK and sovereign rights of the people, standing on the first line of the class struggle over the last more than six decades since its founding.
					
					 After being briefed on the court before a big map showing its panoramic view, he went round the interior and exterior of the court to learn in detail about its construction.
					
					 At the end of his visit to the court he set forth on the spot important tasks which would serve as guidelines for further consolidating the socialist system in the DPRK by strengthening the education in the observance of law.
					
					 He noted that the socialist law in the DPRK serves not only as an effective means for promoting the revolutionization and the working-classization of all members of the society and giving strong impetus to the socialist construction but also as a powerful weapon for performing a great function to organize and mobilize people for economic and cultural construction.
					
					 Thanks to the strict enforcement of the Socialist Constitution under the WPK's leadership a revolutionary system and order have been firmly established throughout the society, the three revolutions, ideological, technical and cultural, made dynamic progress, further augmenting the nation's political, economic and military potentials and the sovereign rights of the working masses have been most firmly protected, he said, adding that the reality clearly proves the advantages and vitality of the socialist legislative system in the DPRK.
					
					 He underscored the need to steadily consolidate the state social system in the DPRK by further strengthening the observance of the socialist law as required by the Socialist Constitution and bring earlier the complete victory of socialism and the cause of building a thriving nation.
					
					 In order to strengthen the observance of law for enforcing the socialist law it is important to increase the function and role of the judicial organ, he noted, underlining the need for the officials in this field to strictly abide by the principle of loyalty to the Party, to the working class and to the people in enforcing law.
					
					 He expressed expectation and conviction that the judicial organs including the Central Court would firmly protect the interests of the state and people and their lives and properties by law with a high sense of responsibility and thus give full play to the might of the most revolutionary and popular and fair and aboveboard law in the DPRK.
					
					 He was accompanied by Kim Pyong Ryul, president of the Central Court, and department directors and first vice department directors of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Victory Won with Grit of Brilliant Commanders
articles.content:
Victory Won with Grit of Brilliant Commanders
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- Forty-two years has elapsed since the Pueblo incident, one of the world's big events in the 20th century.
					 Naval vessels of the Korean People's Army, while on regular guard duty, captured Pueblo, a U.S. armed spy ship, when it entered waters of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea for the purpose of espionage on Jan. 23, Juche 57 (1968).
					
					 The seizure was a legitimate exercise of sovereignty by the DPRK and a self-defense measure to safeguard its dignity and security.
					
					 After the spy ship was seized red-handed in the East Sea of Korea, the U.S. imperialists shamelessly threatened to "retaliate" against the DPRK with a heavy mobilization of various kinds of military equipment, alleging Pueblo was being in international waters with no mission of espionage.
					
					 The situation of Korea was brought to the brink of war, drawing worldwide concern.
					
					 At that time, President Kim Il Sung warned that the Korean people and army would return retaliation for "retaliation" and answer allout war with allout war, manifesting the position that the Korean people did not want a war but were never afraid of it.
					
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il had the whole army and people put in combat readiness, with the stand that even though the U.S. threatened the DPRK with aircraft carrier and warplanes, the captured service members would not be let go as long as the U.S. refused to make an apology.
					
					 The U.S. brought the Pueblo incident to the United Nations Security Council but finally it was compelled to bow to the DPRK and confess its crime. And it signed a document promising that any U.S. vessel would not enter the waters of the DPRK again in the future.
					
					 Indeed, the DPRK's victory in the incident was what the matchless courage and grit of the two brilliant commanders secured.
					
					 Now Pueblo is on display on the Taedong River in Pyongyang where the U.S. ship of aggression "General Sherman" was burnt some 140 years ago.

articles.title: Adherence to Spirit of "By Our Nation Itself" Called for
articles.content:
Adherence to Spirit of "By Our Nation Itself" Called for
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- It was clarified in the June 15 joint declaration that the problem of national reunification should be solved independently by the concerted efforts of the Koreans in the north and the south on the principle of national independence, and this resulted in "By our nation itself", the idea common to the Korean nation in the era of independent reunification.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in a signed article.
					
					 "By our nation itself" is the spirit of the nation in the June 15 era of reunification, it says, and goes on:
					
					 This spirit instills into the fellow countrymen the consciousness of being the master of the cause of national reunification and the will to settle all the issues of the nation with their own efforts. It is, in essence, the spirit of national independence from A to Z whereby to settle either the issues of relationship between the north and the south or the problem of national reunification independently by the concerted efforts of the two sides.
					
					 The internal problems of the Korean nation should be independently solved in keeping with the demand and interests of the nation strictly by the united efforts of the Koreans. This is the fundamental demand of the spirit of "By our nation itself" clarified in the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 It is the demand of the era and the basic guarantee for the independent and peaceful reunification to thoroughly apply the said spirit in the movement for national reunification at present.
					
					 "By our nation itself" is not an idea of any specified person but the nationwide idea cherished in the hearts of all the fellow countrymen ardently wishing for national reunification.
					
					 Anyone who follows this spirit will be a pro-reunification patriot and anyone who denies it will be an anti-reunification element.
					
					 The independent reunification is sure to be realized as there are the June 15 joint declaration, the great programme for independent national reunification, and the October 4 declaration, the programme for implementing it, and the concerted struggle of all the fellow countrymen at home and abroad true to the spirit of "By our nation itself."

articles.title: Vigorous Struggle against Dominationism Urged
articles.content:
Vigorous Struggle against Dominationism Urged
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- It is important to wage a vigorous struggle against dominationism in order to realize global independence, says Rodong Sinmun in a signed article Saturday.
					 Dominationism is, in essence, aimed at violating independence of other countries and nations and oppressing and controlling them, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The imperialists are the most dangerous dominationist forces. They are now seeking to expand their sphere of domination worldwide and hold sway over the destiny of mankind by taking advantage of the fact that their military rivals with differing ism exist no longer and the balance of forces has been upset in the international arena. They employ all means and methods to obliterate other countries and nations.
					
					 The prevailing situation urgently requires the people aspiring after global independence to intensify the struggle against dominationism.
					
					 What is important in this struggle is to thoroughly expose and shatter all sorts of reactionary ideological trends and sophism of the imperialists, the main forces.
					
					 To preserve the Juche character and national identity is a matter of key importance on which depends the victory of the revolution and construction and, at the same time, a vital problem decisive of prosperity of each country and nation.
					
					 Only when the world progressives intensify the struggle to preserve the Juche character and national identity, is it possible to ensure the independent development of each country and nation and realize the popular masses' cause of independence.
					
					 All the countries and nations should conduct in concert the vigorous struggle against dominationism. Only then, is it possible to defend the interests of each country and nation and accelerate the building of independent and rich, new society and global independence.
					
					 To strengthen the struggle against dominationism out of the steadfast independent stand is an important way for frustrating the vicious moves of the dominationists and realize independence.
					
					 The banner of independence is the banner of struggle to oppose all sorts of domination, subjugation and interference by the dominationist forces, consolidate national independence, achieve the independent development and prosperity of each country and protect peace and security.

articles.title: Puppet Police Seizure and Search Operation Denounced
articles.content:
Puppet Police Seizure and Search Operation Denounced
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in south Korea issued a statement on Jan. 20 in denunciation of the puppet police's reckless suppression of a member of a progressive organization.
					 The statement accused the Kyongbuk District Police Office of breaking into the house of Min So Hyon, a member of the "Group of Companions of the Taegu Youth Association in the June 15 Era" on Jan. 19 for a seizure and search operation.
					
					 The police committed such a repressive action, asserting it has information that Min has contacts with the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration and is violating the "National Security Law," it charged, and said:
					
					 We vehemently denounce the indiscriminate suppressive campaign of the man-killing dictatorial "government" ill-famed for crackdown and tyranny.
					
					 Recalling that a countless number of innocent people are falling victims to the suppression perpetrated under the pretext of preserving security due to the dictatorial politics of the present authorities, the statement warned that those seeking to ensure "the stability of power" through suppression are bound to meet a stern judgment by the people.

articles.title: DPRK's Proposal for Peace Supported in Peru
articles.content:
DPRK's Proposal for Peace Supported in Peru
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Preparatory Committee for Commemorating the Centenary of Birth of President Kim Il Sung issued a statement on January 14 in support of the statement of the DPRK Foreign Ministry.
					 Expressing full support for the DPRK's proposal for peace, the statement said:
					
					 The conclusion of a peace treaty would help put an end to the hostile relations between the DPRK and the United States and push ahead with the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula at a rapid tempo. 
					
					 Denouncing the warlike policy of the U.S., the statement said:
					
					 The U.S. does not truly want peace on the Korean Peninsula but considers south Korea as an outpost for aggression in a bid to keep a permanent state of war in Asia.
					
					 It does not want to see the Korean Peninsula denuclearized as it would lead to the withdrawal of its nuclear weapons from south Korea but is only seeking to disarm the DPRK under the pretext of the nuclear issue.
					
					 We bitterly denounce the U.S. and the south Korean authorities for their war moves.
					
					 The parties concerned should positively support the DPRK's proposal guaranteeing peace on the peninsula and the rest of Asia and the world.

articles.title: Reading Sessions on Joint New Year Editorial Held
articles.content:
Reading Sessions on Joint New Year Editorial Held
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- Reading sessions on the joint New Year editorial of the leading newspapers of the DPRK were held by the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism, the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Youth Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Democratic Congo from Jan. 13 to 16.
					 Speeches were made at the sessions.
					
					Ramon Jimenez Lopez, president of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism, said that General Secretary Kim Jong Il is steering the gigantic campaign for building a thriving nation to a shining victory, standing in the van of the drive for effecting a great revolutionary surge in the DPRK advancing with the might of the single-minded unity.
					
					 He expressed belief that the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people would glorify this year, the 65th anniversary of the founding of the WPK, as a year of great changes to be specially recorded in the history of the building of a thriving nation. 
					
					 Juan Campos Vega, chairman of the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, noted that the joint editorial published by the leading newspapers of the DPRK on the New Year serves as a militant banner as it reflects the grandiose plan of Kim Jong Il to bring about a radical turn in the people's standard of living and indicates ways to do so. 
					
					 Nzemba Yangana, chairman of the Youth Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Democratic Congo, extended full support to the Korean people in their efforts to adorn this year marking the 10th anniversary of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the 30th anniversary of the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as a year for bringing about a new phase of independent reunification and replace the Korean Armistice Agreement by a peace treaty.

articles.title: Joint New Year Editorial Introduced
articles.content:
Joint New Year Editorial Introduced
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Colombia and Italy issued bulletins on the joint New Year editorial of the leading newspapers of the DPRK.
					 The Group for the Study of the Juche Idea "Kanggye" of Colombia on Jan. 13 released the first issue of its bulletin carrying the part of the joint editorial dealing with the issue of national reunification under title "Joint New Year Editorial of the DPRK".
					
					 The Group of Dialectical Materialists of Italy and the Italian Branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain separately issued bulletins introducing the main contents of the joint editorial.

articles.title: DPRK Holidays to Be Commemorated in Nigeria
articles.content:
DPRK Holidays to Be Commemorated in Nigeria
 Pyongyang, January 23 (KCNA) -- A Nigerian preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Sun and February 16 was formed on Jan. 15.
					 Ibrahim Mantu, former deputy president of the Senate who is member of the Credit Committee of the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee at the ceremony.
					
					 The committee set the period of commemoration from Jan. 15 to Apr. 30 and decided to hold in this period colorful events highly lauding the immortal feats of the peerlessly great persons and supporting the Korean people in their efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful nation and achieve national reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il ve funcion del Conjunto Nacional de Arte Tradicional
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il ve funcion del Conjunto Nacional de Arte Tradicional
Pyongyang, 23 de enero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, presencio la funcion del Conjunto Nacional de Arte Tradicional.
					Los artistas llevaron a la escena el solo folclorico femenino "No olvidaremos nunca las pruebas que sufrio el Lider", las canciones y bailes "Cuco", "La hermosa tierra natal", "Cancion de los dias de la semana", el trio folclorico femenino "Ongheya de la victoria del Songun" y otras danzas y musicas nacionales elegantes, vivarachas y cadenciosas.
					
					Los ejecutantes cantaron en tono patetico el aspecto feliz del pueblo coreano, que lleva la autentica vida en el regazo afectuoso del Dirigente            Kim Jong Il, y describieron bien la firme conviccion y voluntad del ejercito y el pueblo de cumplir a toda costa la causa revolucionaria del Juche y la de construccion de la gran potencia prospera socialista con la gran bandera del Songun en alto.
					
					A traves de esta funcion original, ellos manifestaron energicamente el poderio de la musica y danza nacionales que se desarrollan esplendidamente.
					
					Terminada la funcion, el Dirigente respondio cordialmente al saludo de los ejecutantes y espectadores, que le aclamaban hospitalariamente, y felicito a los primeros por la exitosa funcion.
					
					Muy satisfecho de que los creadores y artistas del conjunto hayan ofrecido esta magnifica funcion con las canciones y danzas al estilo coreano, aprecio mucho los exitos logrados por ellos en la ocasion y les expreso agradecimiento.
					
					Este conjunto de larga historia es la entidad artistica ameritada que al crear y llevar a la escena en el pasado numerosas obras musicales y coreograficas convenientes a la idiosincrasia y sentimientos nacionales del pueblo coreano en pleno acato a la autoctona idea y linea del partido acerca de literatura y arte, hizo gran aporte al desarrollo de la cultura y arte nacionales y a la educacion de nuestro pueblo en el patriotismo, senalo y valoro altamente los proezas realizadas por los creadores y artistas en la creacion artistica.
					
					En particular, se puso muy alegre de que los actores noveles, recien graduados de la universidad, hayan mostrado su alta habilidad artistica.
					
					Subrayo que es muy prometedor el porvenir del arte del Juche gracias a tales revolucionarios y talentosos artistas de reserva que dan firme continuidad a la musica y danza nacionales.
					
					Crear numerosas obras culturales y artisticas nacionales de contenido socialista al estilo tradicional es la orientacion que mantiene invariablemente nuestro partido, enseno y destaco que los creadores y artistas deben ser verdaderos creadores y defensores fervientes de la cultura y arte socialistas al crear mucho mas obras magnificas convenientes a la demanda de la epoca del Songun y al sentimiento ideologico del pueblo coreano dando prueba de su alta creatividad.
					
					Subrayando que el Conjunto Nacional de Arte Tradicional ocupa un lugar importante para continuar y desarrollar las herencias culturales nacionales y la musica del Juche, presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en la creacion artistica.
					
					Le acompanaron en la ocasion los jefes y los primeros subjefes de departamento y otros cuadros directivos del Comite Central del PTC.

articles.title: Tienen lugar oficios religiosos por efemeride de Buda
articles.content:
Tienen lugar oficios religiosos por efemeride de Buda
Pyongyang, 23 de enero (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 22 en los templos budistas a lo largo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea las "Misas por la reunificacion de la patria en ocasion del dia de adquisicion de gran sabiduria por Buda".
					En estos oficios estuvieron presentes los clerigos del Comite Central de la Federacion de Budistas de Corea, sus comites provinciales, urbanos y distritales, los monjes-jefes, sacerdotes y creyentes de los respectivos templos.
					
					Luego de intervenciones, se dio lectura al texto de oracion por la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					Los oradores senalaron que celebran esa efemeride de Buda justamente cuando todos los habitantes del pais, que recibieron el editorial conjunto de los periodicos principales publicado por el Ano Nuevo, libran la dinamica lucha por imprimir un cambio decisivo en la mejora de la vida del pueblo redoblando su entusiasmo por producir un gran auge revolucionario.
					
					Enfatizaron que bajo la consigna "!Logremos cuanto antes la reunificacion de la Patria, con la unidad de toda la nacion, bajo la bandera de la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur!", todos los budistas del Norte y el Sur de Corea deben llevar al climax el ambiente de la mejora de las relaciones, la reconciliacion, la cooperacion y la unidad entre ambas partes coreanas en el presente ano del 10o aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y el 30o de la presentacion del Proyecto de la Fundacion de la Republica Federal Democratica de Coryo.
					
					Exhortaron a toda la nacion coreana a frustrar con las fuerzas unidas los desafios de toda indole de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion y acelerar la marcha pannacional por la reunificacion para asi adornar brillantemente el 2010 como un ano en que se abra una nueva coyuntura para la reintegracion independiente.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun ratifica vigencia del ideal comun de la nacion coreana
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun ratifica vigencia del ideal comun de la nacion coreana
Pyongyang, 23 de enero (ATCC) -- "Entre nosotros, los connacionales", ideal comun de la nacion en la epoca de reunificacion independiente, hizo su aparicion en este mundo cuando la Declaracion Conjunta Norte-Sur del 15 de Junio aclaro que el problema de reunificacion de la patria debe ser solucionado en el principio de independencia nacional y por las fuerzas unidas de los coreanos del Norte y el Sur. 
					Senala asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual publicado en su edicion de este sabado y prosigue: 
					
					El ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" es el espiritu nacional de la epoca de reunificacion iniciada el 15 de junio.
					
					Este espiritu inspira a todos los coreanos la conciencia del dueno de la causa de reunificacion de la patria y la voluntad de resolver por su propia cuenta todos los problemas que se presentan ante la nacion coreana. En su esencia, es el firme espiritu independiente nacional de solucionar por las fuerzas unidas del Norte y el Sur el problema de las relaciones intercoreanas y el de la reunificacion de la patria.
					
					La demanda fundamental de este espiritu aclarado por la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio es solucionar los asuntos internos nacionales de manera independiente y conforme a la demanda y los intereses de la nacion mediante las fuerzas unidas de la nacion coreana. 
					
					Materializar cabalmente el espiritu de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" en el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria deviene la demanda de la epoca actual y la garantia principal de la reunificacion independiente y pacifica. 
					
					"Entre nosotros, los connacionales" no es un ideal de alguien especifico, sino el de toda la nacion que desea ardientemente la reintegracion territorial de la patria. 
					
					 Quien tiene ese ideal es el patriota pro-reunificacion y otro que lo niega es el elemento anti-reunificacion. 
					
					Se realizara indudablemente la causa de la reunificacion independiente, gracias a la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio, gran programa para la reunificacion independiente nacional, y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, programa de ejecucion de la primera, y a la lucha de todos los integrantes de la nacion que estan unidos y se arden del espiritu de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun subraya necesidad de la lucha contra el dominacionismo
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun subraya necesidad de la lucha contra el dominacionismo
Pyongyang, 23 de enero (ATCC) -- En un articulo individual difundido el dia 23, el diario Rodong Sinmun llamo a librar una dinamica lucha contra el dominacionismo a fin de verificar la independencia en el mundo.
					La esencia del dominacionismo consiste en violar la independencia de otros paises y naciones y oprimirlos y controlarlos, revela asi el articulista y continua:
					
					El imperialismo es la mas peligrosa fuerza dominacionista. Hoy dia, los imperialistas pretenden ampliar a escala mundial la esfera de su dominio y controlar a su antojo el destino de la humanidad aprovechando la desaparicion en la arena internacional de su rival militar, con que se enfrentaban segun el ideal diferente, y la destruccion del equilibrio de las fuerzas. Ellos se valen de todos los medios y metodos para atropellar a otros paises y naciones.
					
					La situacion dada demanda urgentemente a los pueblos aspirantes a la independencia del mundo intensificar aun mas la lucha contra el dominacionismo.
					
					Lo importante de esta lucha es revelar y frustrar de modo resuelto todas las tendencias ideologicas y sofisterias reaccionarias de los imperialistas.
					
					Mantener o no el espiritu Juche y la nacionalidad es el problema clave y vital que decide la victoria o la derrota en la revolucion y la construccion, la prosperidad o la ruina del pais y la nacion.
					
					Cuando los pueblos progresistas del mundo intensifiquen la lucha por mantener el espiritu Juche y la nacionalidad, podran garantizar el desarrollo independiente del pais y la nacion y realizar la causa de independencia de las masas populares.
					
					Si todos los paises y las naciones libran energicamente la lucha comun contra el dominacionismo, pueden defender sus intereses y acelerar la construccion de una nueva sociedad independiente y rica y la verificacion de la independencia en todo el mundo.
					
					Fortalecer la lucha en cuestion manteniendo la firme posicion independiente deviene el importante remedio para frustrar las brutales maniobras de los dominacionistas y verificar la independencia.
					
					La bandera de la independencia es la de lucha por consolidar la independencia nacional rechazando la dominacion, la subyugacion y la intervencion de todas las fuerzas dominacionistas, lograr el desarrollo independiente y la prosperidad del pais y preservar la paz y la seguridad.
